title: Attempt to Access Child of a Non-structure Pointer
overview: Casting a non-structure type to a structure type and accessing a field can lead to memory access errors or data corruption.
remediation: ::PHASE:Requirements:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:The choice could be made to use a language that is not susceptible to these issues.::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Review of type casting operations can identify locations where incompatible types are cast.::
